Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.networking.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
DevCardMarketObserver, FaithTrackObserver, LorenzoObserver, MarketObserver, PlayerItemsObserver, ProductionZoneObserver, StrongboxObserver, WarehouseObserver
public class VirtualView
extends ViewObservable
implements MarketObserver, PlayerItemsObserver, StrongboxObserver, FaithTrackObserver, WarehouseObserver, DevCardMarketObserver, LorenzoObserver, ProductionZoneObserver
This class implements the server's VirtualView, used to send messages to the game clients

      Parameters:
      nicknames - is the list of players' nickname
